title: The Man Who Could Fly But Probably Shouldn't've
description: This is the story of Ernie, who discovered one day that he could fly, and this is the story about everything that happened to him afterwards. It's the story about all the people who wanted to use him, all the people who misunderstood him, and the girl who sort of liked him.This is the story of Ernie, the man who could fly. But probably shouldn't've.
author: H.L.H. Pattison
